name: innards-out

effect.sword_shield: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

effect.legends_arceus: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

short_effect: When this Pokémon faints from an opponent's move, that opponent takes damage equal to the HP this Pokémon had remaining.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit by the amount equal to its last HP.
